SummaryEnglish: Amnesiac Caiman seeks to undo his lizard head curse by killing the sorcerer responsible, with his friend Nikaido's help. In the Hole, that's a threat.
Aliases: ドロヘドロ 魔のおまけ

0.SummaryEnglish: Caiman, Nikaido and members of the En family offer glimpses into their macabre world in these six OVA shorts.

1.SummaryEnglish: A prequel story of how the mystical masks everyone wears within the Sorcerer world are created.

2.SummaryEnglish: A prequel story of how Nikaido got ownership of her “Hungry Bug” restaurant and what it used to be, as the previous owner who took her in was a small-time sorcerer named “Syureon”.

3.SummaryEnglish: Nikaido goes on a small quest to have her picture taken to cement her place within En’s Sorcerer Mafia Branch.

4.TitleEnglish: The Gyoza Fairy That You Don't Know
4.SummaryEnglish: A Tiny mischievous Gyoza creature secretly helps Nikaido’s “Hungry Bug” restaurant through it’s unusual & wacky ways methods.

5.SummaryEnglish: Invitations are sent within the En’s Mafia-family for a Specific tribal-Dance event leading to an interesting flashback from Shin’s past.

6.TitleEnglish: Blowin' in the Night Breeze, an Oba Anniversary
6.SummaryEnglish: Caiman pays a visit to Nikaido at her Hungry Bug restaurant to deliver ingredients and learns first-hand how to make Gyoza.

1.SummaryEnglish: Caiman and Nikaido hunt for the sorcerer who cursed him with a lizard's head, while Fujita returns to the Hole to avenge Matsumura's death.

2.TitleEnglish: In the Bag / Eat Quietly During Meals / My Neighbor the Sorcerer
2.SummaryEnglish: "Cleaners" Shin and Noi get to work in the Hole. Meanwhile, Caiman and Nikaido search for a sorcerer who uses acupuncture to change faces.

3.TitleEnglish: Night of the Dead / Duel! In Front of Central Department Store
3.SummaryEnglish: Caiman and Nikaido take part in the annual Night of the Living Dead. But before they can finish their mission, Shin and Noi show up to finish them.

4.TitleEnglish: Roast Duck With Magic User Sauce / Formal Attire Requested / Another Year in the Hole
4.SummaryEnglish: En consults his comrade Turkey, whose magical dolls may identify the "lizard guy." Caiman and Nikaido visit Kasukabe, a professor studying sorcerers.

5.SummaryEnglish: In the sorcerers' world, Caiman and Nikaido locate a man with cross eyes, but the trail goes cold when Shin and Noi show up on a mission.

6.TitleEnglish: The Mushrooms Are Ready / The First Smoke / Manhole Elegy
6.SummaryEnglish: En's mushroom magic gravely injures Nikaido when she infiltrates his mansion. Dr. Vaux and Professor Kasukabe tell Caiman about Shin's dark past.

7.SummaryEnglish: Plotting to avenge Matsumura, Fujita joins the Hole Peace Hospital’s baseball team: their rival team has his friend's killer Caiman on the roster.

8.TitleEnglish: A Good Day to Leave / Lalala Monsterman / Splendid & Exuberant / Welcome to Blue Night Land
8.SummaryEnglish: Fearing for Nikaido’s safety, Caiman returns to the sorcerers' world alone. The En family begins preparations for the Blue Night Party festivities.

9.TitleEnglish: Ah, Flower Smoke / Wonderful Meat Pie / Blue Night Day 2 / Blue Night Day 3 / The Strange Mushroom Appears!
9.SummaryEnglish: Caiman sneaks into the festival grounds in pursuit of Risu. Meanwhile, En tells Fujita the story of how Shin and Noi became partners.

10.TitleEnglish: Lonely Caiman / Before Nightmare / Manju Terror
10.SummaryEnglish: Nikaido dons a powerful mask to defeat her enemy, only to find the attack was a trap by En. With Tanba's help, Caiman visits one of the Cross-Eyes.

11.TitleEnglish: The Boss / See You at the Food Stall
11.SummaryEnglish: As a member of the family, Nikaido learns why En needs a sorcerer who can manipulate time. Caiman disguises himself as Tanba's wife to rescue her.

12.TitleEnglish: Memories of School Days / Boy Meets Girl = Battle! / Pinky Swear
12.SummaryEnglish: Caiman tries to convince Nikaido to return to the Hole with him, but her contract with En binds her. After the fight, En launches a search for her.
